creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: standing bearded man at left wearing brown, green and blue robes, gold hoop earrings and a gold headdress, holding a flaming cup (?) on a red cloth; man is accompanied by a small fantastic dragon with green eyes and orange breast, levitating a pink flower from its mouth; man in red and black robes with gold patterning, wearing a gold hoop earring and seated on a rock, reaches for pink flower; seated man accompanied by a stern-faced man in blue robes leaning on a gnarled staff
title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
